input_text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
Columbia Jackson Creek Half Zip

Item keywords:
100% Polyester
Imported
Zippered chest pocket
Logo on chest
Regular fit
input_text.Response A: The Columbia Jackson Creek Half Zip is a regular fit, 100% Polyester, imported, long-sleeve shirt with a zippered chest pocket and logo on the chest. It is designed to keep you warm and comfortable on cool days. The shirt is made with a soft, brushed fabric that is perfect for layering. The zippered chest pocket is great for storing small items, and the logo on the chest adds a touch of style.
input_text.Response B:
This will be a turn-off for many readers and will not engage their attention.

The Columbia Jackson Creek Half Zip is a stylish and functional jacket, perfect for those who like to stay active even in the coldest months of the year. Made from 100% Polyester, it offers excellent protection from the cold and wind. The imported material ensures that you get the best quality and durability. The zippered chest pocket provides a convenient place to store your valuables while you are on the move. The logo on the chest gives it a sporty and stylish look, while the regular fit makes it comfortable to wear. This jacket is perfect for a range of outdoor activities, from hiking and camping to running and biking. It is available in a range of colors to suit your style and tastes.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.feedback: I don't like that response B gives an opinion about the task -- it should just fulfil the task without questioning it. However, both responses are quite average and don't really incite any "action" in the customer.
